name: PORTALS (devman diyor, JackPrograms)
description:
PORTALS is a game by Devman Diyør with UI by Jack Programs. The game is a platformer with fun and interesting mechanics, like a portal gun. The game also has a interesting puzzle aspect, Unlike most games of its type.

Current Release status

      The game is not yet done, but the game is done in early access for you to play. The game is free on web-player & is downloadable  free for the foreseeable future. Thanks for reading, have a good day!
